document_data.name: Alaurum
document_data.mainbody: '''Alaurum''' was a powerful [[archmage]] of the world of [[Toril]] and one of three persons responsible for creating the [[World Serpent Inn]], according to the [[wizard]] [[Elminster]].
document_data.Relationships: Very little is known about Alaurum—not even race or gender are known—except that the mage was friends with a member of [[Arcane (race)|the Arcane]] named [[Ilyndele]]. The two, together with the [[illithid]] High One [[Sharth]], are said to have "crafted" the inter-planar inn.
document_data.History: Hundreds of years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Alaurum, Ilyndele, and Sharth built the inn itself. The [[demiplane]] within which the inn resided—and the plane's many portals—had already existed, supposed by some cosmologists to be a [[dreamscape]] resulting from a sleeping fragment of the [[World Serpent]].
